description:
Section 9 investigates a possible post-human hacker who uses the web to incite physical attacks on people. The trail leads to a high school student.
Source: netflix

titles.title: LIDÉ ZE SÍTĚ – Důvody ke vzplanutí
NET PEOPLE 炎上に至る理由
Net People: Enjou ni Itaru Riyuu
Net People: Reasons Leading to Flameout
